query:
SELECT 
  avt.id as task_id,
  avt.highlight_id,
  avt.status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.created_at,
  ph.title as highlight_title,
  ph.duration as highlight_duration,
  ph.audio_url as highlight_audio_url,
  ph.start_time,
  ph.end_time
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
WHERE avt.created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:00:00'
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 3;

  avt.id as task_id,
  avt.highlight_id,
  avt.status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.created_at,
  ph.title as highlight_title,
  ph.duration as highlight_duration,
  ph.audio_url as highlight_audio_url,
  ph.start_time,
  ph.end_time
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
WHERE avt.created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:00:00'
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 3;
